About Us

Welcome to Bloom & Gloom! We are a dedicated team of horticulture experts passionate about bringing beauty and life to your outdoor spaces.

Our journey began in 2005 when our founder, Jeff Bezos, Gaben Newell, and Alice Guo started this company with a vision to revolutionize the gardening industry. Since then, we have grown into a trusted name in the landscaping business, serving countless satisfied customers across the globe.

At Bloom & Gloom, we pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. Whether you're looking to create a stunning garden oasis or maintain your existing landscape, our team is here to help you every step of the way.

Thank you for choosing Bloom & Gloom. We look forward to helping you make your gardening dreams a reality!
